title: Chinook pipeline parameters
description: Schema for the Full GT pipeline parameters

input_options.title: Input Options
input_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data.

project.description: Give a name to this project or run. No spaces or special characters. This is also used as the output subdirectory name in the results folder.

input.description: Path to input FastQ files (must be paired-end)

trimmomatic_options.title: Trimmomatic Options
trimmomatic_options.description: Options for adapter trimming with Trimmomatic.

flash_options.title: FLASH2 Options
flash_options.description: Options for merging paired reads with FLASH2.

min_overlap.description: Minimum overlap length for read merging

max_overlap.description: Maximum overlap length for read merging

processing_options.title: Processing Options
processing_options.description: Options for read processing and data handling.

concat_all_reads.description: Concatenate all available reads per sample (merged, unmerged, and unpaired) for BWA mapping. If false, uses only merged and single-end reads (original behavior).

loci_to_remove.description: Perl-compatible regular expression to match loci column names to remove from analysis. Matches against column names like 'NC_037130.1:1062935-1063235.1' or 'NC_037130.1:1062935-1063235.2'. Leave empty to remove no loci. Cannot contain single quotes.

threshold_options.title: Threshold Options
threshold_options.description: Options for threshold values used in genotype analysis.

ots28_missing_threshold.description: OTS28 missing data threshold (default: 0.7). If less than this proportion of OTS28 data is missing, consider OTS28 data Intermediate instead of uncertain.

gsi_missing_threshold.description: GSI missing data threshold. If more than this proportion of GSI data is missing, consider GSI data invalid.

pofz_threshold.description: PofZ ambiguity threshold. If the maximum Probability of Z-score (PofZ) is less than this value, consider the result ambiguous.

haplotype_depth.description: Haplotype depth filter: remove haplotypes with less than depth specified here
haplotype_depth.help: This is for removing potential genotyping errors or alleles with depths you don't feel confident about.

total_depth.description: Minimum number of reads required for the genotype to be retained

allele_balance.description: Minimum allele balance required for the genotype to be retained.
allele_balance.help: Ratio of the number of reads for a given microhaplotype divided by the number of reads of the most common microhaplotype for that individual at that locus. For example, if you have a heterozygote with 60 reads for the haplotype AA and 100 reads for the haplotype TC, the allele balance for the haplotype AA for that individual at that locus is 0.6 and is 1.0 for TC.

use_sequoia.description: Enable Sequoia for PBT analysis. If false, the pipeline will not run Sequoia.

sequoia_mode.description: Sequoia mode for PBT analysis. Options are 'par' for parentage analysis or 'ped' for full pedigree analysis (takes much longer).

sequoia_missing_threshold.description: Sequoia missing data threshold. If more than this proportion of data is missing, consider the result invalid. Set to 0.2 for conservative cut-off.

parent_geno_input.description: Path to parent genotype file (Sequoia formatted).

parent_lifehistory.description: Path to parent metadata (lifehistory) file (Sequoia formatted).

offspring_birthyear.description: Birth year of the offspring for Sequoia analysis.

offspring_minBY.description: Minimum birth year for offspring in Sequoia analysis.

offspring_maxBY.description: Maximum birth year for offspring in Sequoia analysis. If unknown, set to current year.

offspring_max_age.description: Maximum age of the offspring in the dataset.

species_max_repro_age.description: Maximum reproductive age of the species in the dataset.

species_min_repro_age.description: Minimum reproductive age of the species in the dataset.
